mapper.insert: insert into mem_share (num,userid, s_cate, s_status, s_subject, s_cnt, s_content,s_img1,s_loc,s_gu,s_price,s_date,s_tag) values (boardsq.nextval, #{userid},#{s_cate},#{s_status},#{s_subject},#{s_cnt},#{s_content},#{s_img1},#{s_loc},#{s_gu},#{s_price},#{s_date},#{s_tag})
mapper.select: select num,userid, s_cate, s_subject, s_content,s_img1,s_loc,s_gu,s_price,s_date,s_tag from mem_share b where rownum <=1 and userid=#{userid} order by num desc
